description: Noble Architecture JSON Formatting Rules - Enforced Project-Wide

rules.name: Top-Level Keys Must Use Title_Case_With_Underscores
rules.description: Top-level keys in JSON must follow the Title_Case_With_Underscores format.

rules.name: Nested Keys Must Use lowercase-hyphen-format
rules.description: All nested keys (Level 2 and beyond) must use lowercase-hyphen-format.

rules.name: Indent With 4 Spaces Only
rules.description: All JSON files must use 4 spaces for each level of indentation. Tabs are not permitted.

rules.name: Align Colons With Consistent Spacing
rules.description: Property names must be left-aligned, with exactly 2 spaces before and after the colon.

rules.name: Standardised Version History Format
rules.description: All version history must follow the specified object/array structure for File_Version_History_Log.

rules.name: Arrays Aligned With Parent Key
rules.description: All array elements must be indented consistently and aligned under their parent property.
